title: Game is stuck
body:
I was in the middle of a ranked game when everyone disconnected and now I cannot re-enter the game and am stuck on the reconnect thing. I checked op.gg and lolnexus and both show I'm still in game.

**I spoke to the Jarvan IV in this game and he to is experiencing this issue and is also unable to play another game. Riot fix your stuff**

replies.body:
You can pause in ranked? Or is that what happens when everyone dcs?

Wait, the game would just end if that happens.

...

sp00ky ghosts
